title: Can't install league, because it says error. It says "source file not found \disk1.cab." NEED HELP
body: Just need some help on other way to install the game or solve the problems thanks, also i already installed this game on my computer but now because want reinstall it doesn't work thanks.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: It sounds like the installation didn't go properly.  Make sure that you're downloading League from the [official site](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload), and that your PC has permissions to read and write the installation.  Best way to make sure is by going through the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to give access. Hopefully that will get you fixed up!
